channel.title: Wizkeld v2 and derivescape v1! updated
channel.description:
Here are some info about wizkeld v2
[ul][li]I've Added A Skull TImer[/li][li][list] [list][li]Currently adding more of a jad wave[/li][li] [list][li]New Home and starting Items[/li][li] [list][li]Added fletching[/li] [li]New Hyde Random Event Be careful![/li] [li]New PkBox [/li][li]Added Berserker mini[/li] [li]Added Xmas Event[/li][li] [list][li]Added New Bandos Mini[/li][/list] [list][li]New Ladder Bank Video[/li][li]Added D bow 2X Hit + Projectiles[/li] [li]Added LaggHandler[/li] [li]D bow hits 2x[/li] [li]All Bows Now have projectiles[/li] [li]New Skill [Gladiatory[/li] [li]New Minigame to get 99 gladiatory[/li] [li]Cooking Handler[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [/list]
Picture's
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2h4fcyc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/10rk329.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25z5fly.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2u8jslx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/143ng9x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/10hvpzs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2z4wuo3.jpg[/img] Videos [list] [li][url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=o0uh45&s=5]New Town Vid[/url][list][li] [/li][li][url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=e66m1z&s=5]Ladder Bank[/url][list]
[/li][li][url=http://uppit.com/QUKU2A]Uppit Download[/url][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list]
credits: mod allstar 10% me 90%
^DeriveScape V1 Is Finaly here!^ Note:[b]Please post on this topic if you read, or download[/b] [img]http://r9.fodey.com/2033/bdbf1ebf10364f7cbdc98ea8c04f6b3f.0.gif[/img] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Here it is :) i was looking on my pc what ive coded and foun that source above and this hope you have fun :D [size=15pt][b]Pictures[/b][/size] [b]NEW Home[/b]: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/27xklfr.png[/img] Home portals: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/33c3cdx.png[/img] The old home sucks so I decided to go with a different approach to the new home Credits to me for the area [b]Shops:[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/21487k2.png[/img] [b] This is the brand new shops area made by me I made it because lots of people didnt like the allstarscape one New npcs and Items in shops for V2 :P 1v1pk:[/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2itj8kl.png[/img] I didnt like the Idea of the pkbox being 1V1 And I had to have a team area and a 1V1 area :p So I swapped them around [b]FunPk[/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2mw8qqb.png[/img] Funpk...Seriously came out better then I thought Credits to silabsoft.org/smf For the tutorial (I made it so that you can move when you Die Lol XD)
[b]Train area:[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/3165fk9.png[/img] This is getting a definate change in V2 [b]NEVER BEFORE SEEN SKILL AREA(S)[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/70au5l.png[/img] [b]Thats where the portal takes you[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/j6kheq.png[/img] [b]Pkbox:[/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25ytx82.png[/img] [b]Pkboat:[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/xoi15z.png[/img] [b]Vengance[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vqqixy.png[/img]
[b]Credits[/b]
[b]silabsoft[/b] [b]Moparscape[/b] [b]Mod allstar[/b] [b]Me[/b]
[b]Download:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/KJBBYL]http://uppit.com/KJBBYL[/url] [/list][/ul]

item.title: Wizkeld v2 and derivescape v1! updated
item.dc:creator: @spearo spearo
item.description:
@spearo wrote:

I wanna suggest a few things that would improve this release IMO.
remove the portals & make actual teleporting through the magebook.
change the area you have for pking, leave it as the normal rs wildy in varrock/edge etc.
allow some npcs too move so they aren’t all looking the same direction & make sure they are spread out its more appealing.

I like this release anyway good luck on future updates, Not gonna use though. I like that you have the old gameframe btw.

Read full topic
item.source: Wizkeld v2 and derivescape v1! updated
